snippet.title: Astromeda MOTHER Direct Trailer
snippet.description:
ASTROMEDA is an adventure RPG, featuring unique fast-paced and turn-based battles in a mysterious, charming world. You are a human who returns to an Earth inhabited by intelligent Bacteria. Explore a rich world, befriend or fight quirky characters, and uncover the mysteries of the Bacteria kind.

👩🏻‍🚀 Wishlist on Steam or try out the demo!  ➡ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2560210/Astromeda/
 
Dive deep into the world of Astromeda, full of lovable, quirky characters with highly expressive hand-drawn pixelart animations! Including unique gameplay mechanics! The fusion of real-time fast-paced and turn-based combat offers an exhilarating experience that is easy to get hooked on!

Follow the game's socials and join the Discord! 👍 
➽ Twitter: https://twitter.com/astromeda_game
➽ Discord: https://discord.com/invite/HwyB6XM

#Astromeda #rpg
